BasicInfo.short: Parablu enables you to trust Cloud. Parablu helps enterprises migrate and manage their data in the cloud securely.

Products.description: SECURE FILE SHARING AND COLLABORATION SOLUTION FOR THE AGILE ENTERPRISE

Products.description: TOTAL SECURITY AND PRIVACY ON THE CLOUD

Products.name: BluDrive – Secure Large File Transfer
Products.description: SECURE LARGE FILE TRANSFER SOLUTION FOR ENTERPRISES
